title: Conversations about Bizmos
content: Friends and relatives know I've had this idea for a long time, of roving vehicles that aren't just recreational, get work done. We already have lots of utility vehicles on the road, including some that provide health care.This trip north have provided some more opportunities to discuss the idea.  I just filed [another brain dump](http://groups.yahoo.com/group/synergeo/message/63675) to Synergeo on the topic.I've got a lot of interesting science fiction going, way better than most IMO, in the sense of realizable.  So much dilly-dallying goes on.  Where's the beef?
author: Kirby Urner
